column5: My place is basically on the Woodlands Country Club and resort property its about 200ft walking distance to the Tennis courts on the resort. Pools, driving range are near. My place is close to, restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, shopping and nightlife on the woodlands waterway. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the location, the people, the coziness, quiet atmosphere. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
